author: crossley
msg: Improve the help message. Moved it higher up, before Cocoon starts.
Otherwise it is too late. If Cocoon encounters a broken link, then it will
report failure at the end, and we will not get a chance to issue our help msg.

author: crossley
msg: We agreed that all dynamic facilities are off by default.

author: crossley
msg: Report the forrest version number to help with user feedback.
Needed to move the <echo> to after the setting of some vars.

author: crossley
msg: Do not understate the limitations of docbook2document.xsl
